column3: â€œI never smoked weed until very recently. It was suggested after moving to WA state and a friend has been telling me it would help with my PTSD. Based on the suggestion of the lady at our local shop I've been smoking this. Someone else also suggested this site today and I was really surprised to find all the reviews about the effects of this strain! Definitely helps with my PTSD, general anxiety, panic attacks, depres...â€
â€œBest strain I have grown yet. very good taste and a heavy hitter.â€
â€œMy go to strain. I always get a ton of keef in the catcher from this strain. On top of that it gives me a nice relaxing high where I can sit back and enjoy most anything. Good for sex too.â€
â€œexceptional flavors,especially when crossed with Bubble Kush. Black Bubba as it is called, is my absolute favorite.â€

mellowing effect and eases anxiety
smooth smoke and ends to put you in sleep modeâ€

â€œExcuse me because it's seems I passed out fully dress smoking this stuff!  Stuff hits you pretty hard good for those nights you can't Sleep and perfect for watching the BBC life!â€
â€œSmells citrusy. Floating-on-water feeling, tingly tongue, semi-numb lips, feel like fireworks go off within you, warmth.â€

â€œJust got ahold of this strain for the first time and found it quite nice..Dense and compact buds, sticky and with a wonderful sweet aroma with a fuelie background note. I used it in my herbalizer and the vapor was so smooth and oh so ğŸ˜‹.Beautiful soft berry/citrus flavor from some nice thick vapor, immediately relaxing for me, I drifted off into a mellow and relaxing sleep.â€
â€œNice strain with beautiful dense sticky buds. pungent fruity earthy citrus notes with a very relaxing head to toe felt high perfect for one whom seeks relaxing mellow vibes.â€
â€œSleepyâ€
â€œSmoking Black Russian from Dream City, Washington State. Very sweet nose, earthy flavor, great couch effects. I'm impressed. Good work Dream City. ;)â€

â€œGreat for anxiety and insomnia.â€
â€œIt's great so relaxed, and they do sell it in colorado in Greeley in garden center smokeys 420â€

â€œI love it my new favorite. So long lasting high just what I neededâ€
â€œThis has a sweet taste when smoked. The high is not instantaneous, but once it hit me, I was able to totally relax. It did make me sleepy, so this would be a good one to smoke right before bed.â€

â€œThe High is subjective and unique to everyone. 

It was like riding a train, or perhaps a bus, but itâ€™s a familiar commute. Landmarks sweep past, and youâ€™re into a book or bopping along to a song, Joeâ€™s warm in your hand (go ahead, make it lewd). Itâ€™s like this, only softly intense. 

Black Russian, ironically felt by me considering the political climate, feels like home. No witch hunts please.â€

â€œBlack Russian it's  a tasty high sweet on the exhale for me  love the flavor.  the bud smokes good the high is relaxing very Mellow. the relaxed feeling is nice something you wanna smoke out  by  the pool or beach   if you get too comfortable it's night night. acquire food before this smoke you will be feasting lol great smoke for after work or  lazy Sunday at a BBQâ€

â€œVery relaxing Indica, with an interesting balance of head and body effects.  I tried it for sleep.  Its not a strain that will lull you into sleep instantly.  Some heady Sativa sensations prevent that, but after an hour and half, I was comfortable enough to get some zzzzz's.â€
â€œwonderfully tastiest weed I have ever had the privilege of smoking.â€
â€œThis strain is really good. When I was high I was really creative, I thought about things that happened in my childhood :Dâ€
â€œMuy buena 100% recomendable. Efecto electrico y gran saborâ€
â€œTastes very good. It is definitely a strong relaxer but I find in the beginning of my high I have some energy and like doing things like laundry or dishes.â€
â€œdon't know if it was caz I was sick or what but super coughy for me. didn't get much of medication or buzz at all.â€
â€œvery nice high , smokes slowly and tast great makes you mad hungry and relax muscle pain would recommend to everyday smokersâ€

â€œThis bud stays true to that berry taste. One hit wonder type. Best if used right before you go to sleep, or I noticed works a lot better then a sativa taking for anxiety later in your day. This is my go to strain for sleep. Doesn't take much, saving you more money. A must try!â€
â€œDoesn't hit you harsh... Which is the best part... Mellow high.. Great for a night cap..... Clears your mind from all the fogginess...love itâ€
â€œvery sleepy high with a strong berry taste. extremely smooth and relaxing. starts to make my body feel tight in certain spots if I sit in one position for too longâ€

â€œWhile White widow is one of my favorite strains, this mix of Black Domina and her isn't quite on par with what I expected. Very sedating and mellowing, witch was it's only saving grace. Found the lemony flavor pretty nice, but all other flavor was just meh.  I have not tried Black Domina yet, but am interested in trying just her. Nice, but if there are other choices, I'd keep my mind open about it!!â€
â€œvery nice high , burns slowly and tast very nice i would recommend this to my everyday smokasâ€
â€œFantastic for relaxation!â€
â€œIt was pretty good. Very chillaxing.â€

â€œSubtle citrus tones make way to a heavy skunk-scented smoke. Cerebral effects include heavy eyelids and an overall sense of well-being. This strain pairs well with any purple (blueberry my personal choice.) Flowers may not be dense but they are potent enough to feel effects. This strain falls into my sleep/night" mix.â€"
â€œBravo! The terpenes give this indica dominate a great uplifting, heady effect with the whole body feelin it as well. Great for pain as listed; relief of muscle spasms so welcomed :)â€
